scripts.ci: npm run clean && npm run lint && npm run test && npm run build:prod
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build:prod
scripts.dev: npm run clean:cache && npm run webpack-dev-server -- --config config/webpack.dev.ts --mode development --env development --color --hot
scripts.serve:build: npm run build:prod && npm run serve
scripts.clean: npm run clean:dist && npm run clean:cache
scripts.test:e2e: npm run clean:testresults && cross-env frontendServer=http://localhost:3060 IS_DEV=true envId=10 npm run protractor
scripts.protractor: cross-env TS_NODE_PROJECT=tsconfig.test.json node -r ts-node/register -r tsconfig-paths/register ../../node_modules/protractor/bin/protractor protractor.conf.ts
scripts.protractor:nightly: cross-env TS_NODE_PROJECT=tsconfig.test.json node -r ts-node/register -r tsconfig-paths/register node_modules/protractor/bin/protractor protractor.conf.ts
